description: Probe template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.3.3
title: Probe  template schema

propertyDescriptions.External_ID: External ID (PubChem, CheBI, ZINC, etc.) corresponding to the canonical representation
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Inactive_control: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Inactive control
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_In_vivo_activity: Status for the GPCR probe milestone In vivo activity
propertyDescriptions.Link_to_the_supporting_data: External link to the data deposited in public repository/location
propertyDescriptions.Link_Milestone_Inactive_control: Link for the GPCR probe milestone Inactive control
propertyDescriptions.Link_Milestone_In_vivo_activity: Link for the GPCR probe milestones in chemicalprobes.org
propertyDescriptions.Activity: On target activity as reported to chemicalprobes.org
propertyDescriptions.Selectivity: Selectivity against similar genes as reported to chemicalprobes.or
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_3D_model: Status for the GPCR probe milestone 3D model
propertyDescriptions.Name: Canonical (trade or IUPAC) name of molecule
propertyDescriptions.Gene: Gene that the resource is related to
propertyDescriptions.Endpoint: Data endpoint format (log2 expression, fold change, etc.)
propertyDescriptions.Data_Link: Link to external data repository containing key dataset metadata
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Cellular_activity: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Cellular activity
propertyDescriptions.Link_Milestone_Probe_available: Link for the GPCR probe milestone Probe available (to ZINC or Sigma)
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Selectivity: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Selectivity
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Potency: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Potency
propertyDescriptions.Negative_control: Name of inactive analog (probe is the active analog in the "probe pair")
propertyDescriptions.Assay_ID: Assay(s) associated with the data (BAO IDs)
propertyDescriptions.Probe_page: Link to chemicalprobes.org where the probe is registered
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Probe_available: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Probe available (in ZINC or Sigma)
propertyDescriptions.Title: Name/title of the dataset
propertyDescriptions.Repository_page_link: Link to the vendor for the physical sample
propertyDescriptions.Negative_control_repository_page: Link to the vendor for the physical sample of negative control
propertyDescriptions.Ligand_type: Mode of action towards given gene
propertyDescriptions.Data_Format: Data file format(s) - MS, txt, HDF5, etc.
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Physical_screen_confirm: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Physical screen confirmed actives
propertyDescriptions.Status_Milestone_Docking_confirmed_activ: Status for the GPCR probe milestone Docking confirmed actives
propertyDescriptions.Endpoint_detection: Physical entity/method to calculate endpoint - fluorescence intensity, mass spec, etc.
propertyDescriptions.External_ID_registration_system: Repository corresponding to the external ID
propertyDescriptions.Negative_control_activity: On target activity of negative control, as reported to chemicalprobes.org
